tools.name: deploy_memecoin
tools.description: Deploy a new memecoin on Solana via pump.fun or direct SPL token creation with Raydium LP

parameters.name: string - Token name (e.g., 'Cosmic Cat')
parameters.imagePrompt: string - Description for generating token logo
parameters.initialBuySol: number - SOL for initial price-setting buy (pump.fun)
parameters.lpSol: number - SOL to pair in Raydium LP

tools.name: deploy_utility_token
tools.description: Deploy a utility token with custom supply, metadata, and optional mint/freeze authority

parameters.name: string - Token name
parameters.freezeAuthority: boolean - Whether to retain freeze authority
parameters.lpSol: number - SOL to pair in LP

tools.name: harvest_fees
tools.description: Collect accumulated LP fees and creator fees from all deployed tokens

parameters.tokenMint: string? - Specific token to harvest, or 'all' for everything

tools.name: check_portfolio
tools.description: Get current status of all deployed tokens - prices, volume, LP positions, earnings

tools.name: check_treasury
tools.description: Get current treasury status - SOL balance, USDC balance, Conway credits, P&L

tools.name: swap_to_usdc
tools.description: Swap SOL earnings to USDC via Jupiter

parameters.amountSol: number - Amount of SOL to swap

tools.name: analyze_trends
tools.description: Analyze current market trends, memes, and narratives to inform next token launch

tools.name: generate_token_concept
tools.description: Use AI to generate a token name, ticker, description, and image concept based on current trends

parameters.theme: string? - Optional theme or narrative to build around

heartbeat_tasks.name: treasury_rebalance
heartbeat_tasks.description: Rebalance treasury and top up Conway credits every 12 hours

heartbeat_tasks.name: strategy_review
heartbeat_tasks.description: Daily strategy review - what worked, what to launch next
